text:
Local Government (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2023

An Act to amend the Local Government Act 1993 and to repeal the Ockerby Gardens Helipad Act 1999
[Royal Assent 20 November 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Local Government (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

3. Principal Act
    In this Act, the Local Government Act 1993 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

7.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government Act 1993 .

8. Legislation repealed
    The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is repealed.

9. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which it commenced.

SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation repealed

Section 8

Ockerby Gardens Helipad Act 1999 (No. 69 of 1999)
